pages.text: $(li)The Honey Bottle is a delicious drinkable food.$(br)$(li)Apiarists will exchange your Honey Bottles by Emeralds.
$(li)You can obtain a Honey Bottle right clicking a Beehive while you are holding a Glass Bottle on your hand.
$(li)Honey Bottles are a useful ingredient that can be used in multiples food recipes in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)You can use Honey Bottles to craft other useful items in a Crafting Table too.

$(br)$(l)      Food Recipes$()$(br)$(li)Honey Glazzed Gooseberries$(li)Candies$(li)Honey Apples$(li)Honey Glazed Porkchop$(li)Honey Apples$(li)Gooseberry Jam$(li)Honey Bread$(br2)$(l)        Others$()$(br)$(li)Sugar$(li)Honey Block$(li)Honey Lamps
